title: Hurricane Melissa live updates: ‘dangerous storm surge’ expected in Bahamas after dozens reported dead in Haiti
summary: A hurricane warning remains active for regions including Bermuda. Meanwhile, the mayor of a southern coastal town in Haiti is urgently seeking government assistance amid the ongoing crisis. Efforts are being made to address the needs of vulnerable communities affected by the storm.

title: Liverpool v Crystal Palace: Carabao Cup – live
summary: A minute-by-minute report is underway as the 10-time League Cup winners seek to regain their form against Oliver Glasner's team. The match is being covered by Scott Murray. Stay tuned for live updates and insights.

title: Top Senate Democrat blames ‘heartless’ Trump for food aid being cut off – US politics live
summary: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer criticized the president for halting SNAP benefits for millions of Americans during the government shutdown. He highlighted the detrimental impact on vulnerable families relying on food assistance. The overall economic cost of the shutdown is projected to reach $14 billion.
